nodes.title: I Work for the Environment. Watching the World Burn Is the New Normal.

nodes.title: Singapore’s ivory trade ban tackles elephant in room but work ahead a mammoth task
nodes.content: Singapore’s ivory ban is a win for conservation but we must double down on wider conservation efforts, says WWF-Singapore’s Kim Stengert. This week marked the end of a long wait for Singapore to stop the sale of ivory and ivory products and a victory for those working to put this in place.  Over the last […]
